text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Vital Signs Body Temperature

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    276885007 Core body temperature (observable entity)
    300076005 Basal body temperature (observable entity)
    307047009 Core body temperature measured in rectum (observable entity)
    364246006 Core body temperature measured vaginally (observable entity)
    386725007 Body temperature (observable entity)
    415882003 Core body temperature measured in axillary region (observable entity)
    415921007 Temperature of forehead using skin strip thermometer (observable entity)
    415922000 Temperature of forehead (observable entity)
    415929009 Core body temperature measured in inguinal region (observable entity)
    415945006 Core body temperature measured in sublingual space (observable entity)
    415974002 Core body temperature measured at tympanic membrane (observable entity)
    431598003 Core body temperature measured in esophagus (observable entity)
    431807005 Body temperature taken with digital thermometer (observable entity)
    698831002 Core body temperature measured in nasopharynx (observable entity)
    698832009 Core body temperature measured at urinary bladder (observable entity)
    708499008 Core body temperature of neonate at birth (observable entity)

name: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Vital Signs Body Temperature
